title: docs: model: Replace -features with -model-features
body:
When running the scikitlr example from: https://intel.github.io/dffml/plugins/dffml_model.html#dffml-model-scikit

```console
$ dffml train     -model scikitlr     -features def:Years:int:1 def:Expertise:int:1 def:Trust:float:1     -model-predict Salary     -sources f=csv     -source-filename train.csv     -source-readonly     -log debug
/home/pdxjohnny/.pyenv/versions/3.7.2/lib/python3.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/dtypes.py:526: FutureWarning: Passing (type, 1) or '1type' as a synonym of type is deprecated; in a future version of numpy, it will be understood as (type, (1,)) / '(1,)type'.
  _np_qint8 = np.dtype([("qint8", np.int8, 1)])
/home/pdxjohnny/.pyenv/versions/3.7.2/lib/python3.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/dtypes.py:527: FutureWarning: Passing (type, 1) or '1type' as a synonym of type is deprecated; in a future version of numpy, it will be understood as (type, (1,)) / '(1,)type'.
  _np_quint8 = np.dtype([("quint8", np.uint8, 1)])
/home/pdxjohnny/.pyenv/versions/3.7.2/lib/python3.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/dtypes.py:528: FutureWarning: Passing (type, 1) or '1type' as a synonym of type is deprecated; in a future version of numpy, it will be understood as (type, (1,)) / '(1,)type'.
  _np_qint16 = np.dtype([("qint16", np.int16, 1)])
/home/pdxjohnny/.pyenv/versions/3.7.2/lib/python3.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/dtypes.py:529: FutureWarning: Passing (type, 1) or '1type' as a synonym of type is deprecated; in a future version of numpy, it will be understood as (type, (1,)) / '(1,)type'.
  _np_quint16 = np.dtype([("quint16", np.uint16, 1)])
/home/pdxjohnny/.pyenv/versions/3.7.2/lib/python3.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/dtypes.py:530: FutureWarning: Passing (type, 1) or '1type' as a synonym of type is deprecated; in a future version of numpy, it will be understood as (type, (1,)) / '(1,)type'.
  _np_qint32 = np.dtype([("qint32", np.int32, 1)])
/home/pdxjohnny/.pyenv/versions/3.7.2/lib/python3.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/dtypes.py:535: FutureWarning: Passing (type, 1) or '1type' as a synonym of type is deprecated; in a future version of numpy, it will be understood as (type, (1,)) / '(1,)type'.
  np_resource = np.dtype([("resource", np.ubyte, 1)])
DEBUG:dffml.cli.ml.Train:Setting log = 20
DEBUG:dffml.cli.ml.Train:Setting model = <class 'abc.LinearRegressionModel'>
DEBUG:dffml.cli.ml.Train:Setting sources = [<class 'abc.CSVSource'>]
DEBUG:dffml.CSVSource:CSVSourceConfig(filename='train.csv', label='unlabeled', readonly=True, key='src_url', labelcol='label')
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/pdxjohnny/.pyenv/versions/3.7.2/bin/dffml", line 11, in <module>
    load_entry_point('dffml', 'console_scripts', 'dffml')()
  File "/home/pdxjohnny/Documents/python/dffml/dffml/util/cli/cmd.py", line 178, in main
    result = loop.run_until_complete(cls.cli(*argv[1:]))
  File "/home/pdxjohnny/.pyenv/versions/3.7.2/lib/python3.7/asyncio/base_events.py", line 584, in run_until_complete
    return future.result()
  File "/home/pdxjohnny/Documents/python/dffml/dffml/util/cli/cmd.py", line 154, in cli
    cmd = args.cmd(**cls.sanitize_args(vars(args)))
  File "/home/pdxjohnny/Documents/python/dffml/dffml/util/cli/cmds.py", line 79, in __init__
    self.model = self.model.withconfig(self.extra_config)
  File "/home/pdxjohnny/Documents/python/dffml/dffml/base.py", line 329, in withconfig
    return cls(cls.config(config, *above))
  File "/home/pdxjohnny/Documents/python/dffml/model/scikit/dffml_model_scikit/scikit_models.py", line 177, in config
    features=cls.config_get(config, above, "features"),
  File "/home/pdxjohnny/Documents/python/dffml/dffml/base.py", line 237, in config_get
    ".".join(label_above[:-1]),
dffml.base.MissingConfig: LinearRegressionModel missing 'features' from model.scikitlr
```

We must have missed the instance of `-features` in the docs that should have become `-model-features`. We should look around and make sure that everything got changed.

```console
 git grep \\-features
dffml/skel/model/README.md:  -features \
dffml/skel/model/README.md:  -features \
dffml/skel/model/README.md:  -features \
docs/plugins/dffml_model.rst:        -model-features \
docs/plugins/dffml_model.rst:        -model-features \
docs/plugins/dffml_model.rst:        -model-features \
docs/plugins/dffml_model.rst:        -model-features \
docs/plugins/dffml_model.rst:        -model-features \
docs/plugins/dffml_model.rst:        -model-features \
docs/plugins/dffml_model.rst:        -model-features def:Years:int:1 \
docs/plugins/dffml_model.rst:        -model-features def:Years:int:1 \
docs/plugins/dffml_model.rst:        -model-features def:Years:int:1 \
docs/plugins/dffml_model.rst:        -features FEATURE_DEFINITION \
docs/plugins/dffml_model.rst:        -features FEATURE_DEFINITION \
docs/plugins/dffml_model.rst:        -features FEATURE_DEFINITION \
docs/plugins/dffml_model.rst:        -features def:Years:int:1 def:Expertise:int:1 def:Trust:float:1 \
docs/plugins/dffml_model.rst:        -features def:Years:int:1 def:Expertise:int:1 def:Trust:float:1 \
docs/plugins/dffml_model.rst:        -features def:Years:int:1 def:Expertise:int:1 def:Trust:float:1 \
docs/usage/integration.rst:        -features \
docs/usage/integration.rst:        -features \
docs/usage/integration.rst:        -features \
examples/maintained/cgi-bin/api-ml.py:        '-features',
model/scikit/README.md:    -model-features def:Years:int:1 def:Expertise:int:1 def:Trust:float:1 \
model/scikit/README.md:    -model-features def:Years:int:1 def:Expertise:int:1 def:Trust:float:1 \
model/scikit/README.md:    -model-features def:Years:int:1 def:Expertise:int:1 def:Trust:float:1 \
model/scikit/dffml_model_scikit/__init__.py:        -features FEATURE_DEFINITION \\
model/scikit/dffml_model_scikit/__init__.py:        -features FEATURE_DEFINITION \\
model/scikit/dffml_model_scikit/__init__.py:        -features FEATURE_DEFINITION \\
model/scikit/dffml_model_scikit/__init__.py:        -features def:Years:int:1 def:Expertise:int:1 def:Trust:float:1 \\
model/scikit/dffml_model_scikit/__init__.py:        -features def:Years:int:1 def:Expertise:int:1 def:Trust:float:1 \\
model/scikit/dffml_model_scikit/__init__.py:        -features def:Years:int:1 def:Expertise:int:1 def:Trust:float:1 \\
model/scratch/README.md:$ dffml train -model scratchslr -features def:Years:int:1 -model-predict Salary -sources f=csv -source-filename dataset.csv -source-readonly -log debug
model/scratch/README.md:$ dffml accuracy -model scratchslr -features def:Years:int:1 -model-predict Salary -sources f=csv -source-filename dataset.csv -source-readonly -log debug
model/scratch/README.md:$ echo -e 'Years,Salary\n6,0\n' | dffml predict all -model scratchslr -features def:Years:int:1 -model-predict Salary -sources f=csv -source-filename /dev/stdin -source-readonly -log debug
model/scratch/dffml_model_scratch/slr.py:            -model-features def:Years:int:1 \\
model/scratch/dffml_model_scratch/slr.py:            -model-features def:Years:int:1 \\
model/scratch/dffml_model_scratch/slr.py:            -model-features def:Years:int:1 \\
model/tensorflow/dffml_model_tensorflow/dnnc.py:            -model-features \\
model/tensorflow/dffml_model_tensorflow/dnnc.py:            -model-features \\
model/tensorflow/dffml_model_tensorflow/dnnc.py:            -model-features \\
model/tensorflow/dffml_model_tensorflow/dnnr.py:            -model-features \\

model/tensorflow/dffml_model_tensorflow/dnnr.py:            -model-features \\
model/tensorflow/tests/test_dnnc.py:                "--model-features",
model/tensorflow/tests/test_dnnr.py:                "--model-features",
model/tensorflow/tests/test_dnnr.py:                "--model-features",
news/origin_master_August_15_2019.txt:    -features def:Years:int:1 \
news/origin_master_August_15_2019.txt:    -features def:Years:int:1 \
news/origin_master_August_15_2019.txt:    -features def:Years:int:1 \
service/http/tests/test_routes.py:                "--model-features",
tests/test_base.py:                "--test-features",
```
